entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
